title: DENVER ACUPUNCTURE LOUNGE - Crystal Healing
cleaned_text: What is Crystal Healing? Crystal healing uses the power of crystals to realign the energy in and around the body. It also removes blocked energy from the charkas system allowing the free flow of balanced energy to course through the body. Connecting the energy body to Earth and the Cosmic energies. What are the Benefits of Crystal Healing? Reduction of Emotional Extremes Clarity in Decision Making Creating & Maintaining Emotional Boundaries Healthier Relationships Improved Physical, Mental, & Emotional Health. $70 for a 60 minute session with Kandi Justice
